filling.translation[0].definitions[0].de: food that is filling makes your stomach feel full
filling.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Pasta and rice are both very filling.
filling.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a small amount of metal or other substance that is put into your tooth to cover a hole
